channel.title: Gurilla Radio
channel.description: The complete show about absolutely nothing! Listen to Reverend Dan. Dan is ecentric and one sided. Listen to him tackle comical news storys, do funny phone bits and skits. This truly is the complete show about nothing!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Give it a listen!
channel.itunes:author: Reverend Dan
